answers.answer: Well when I took my first test I was about 29 weeks and my nurse told me it didn't matter what and if I had anything before that as long as I didn't eat drink or throw up in one hour. Hopefully everything come out fine on your next test.
Your smoothie was probably the cause, guess you'll see next time.I made sure I fasted in fear of inaccurate results.

Did you ask your doctor why they had you take it so early? Usually they wait until 22-28 weeks because it can develop later on in pregnancy. Also, if you ate anything high in sugar before hand it could definitely affect the results. I didn't have to fast for my test but I didn't eat anything with sugar so I didn't affect the results
Because I explained to him that I feel as if I'm getting big fast, he said that can show a sign of being diabetic so he wanted to check me sooner than later.

Definitely understandable but if it does come back negative the second time I would definitely asked to be tested again later on in pregnancy! My OB explained that a change can happen in weeks for gestational diabetes! But before your next test, just try not to eat anything sugary beforehand (:
I was told to not eat or drink anything sugary before. My appointment was at 7:30 AM so I just didn't eat yet
I failed my first test because I had a corn tortilla but my second year which I couldn't eat anything for 12 hours came back normal. Good luck

question: I'm currently 10 weeks and I took my glucose test last week because I explained to my doctor that I was worried about how I feel as If im getting so big quickly. He asked that I get tested since thyroid problems and being diabetic run in the family. Anyway I didn't not fast the morning of "because I didn't know I was going to be  Tested "and I had a smoothie King drink that morning and i bearly failed my test ): I go back next Wednesday so I'm hoping praying that I pass this time!! My question is do you think I failed because I had a smoothie high in sugar 3hrd prior? And did you fall your test the first time and pass your second test?
title: failing my glucose test
